verbose_text: Shortening of these procedures has numerous potential advantages including reduced duration the patient remains sedated, leading to potentially reduced dosages of sedative and analgesic drugs (which is very important in these patients who often have numerous co-morbidities), and more efficient usage of a CT scanner.
